realName.title: Real name authentication
realName.gytips: In order to implement the appointment and real name authentication system for express delivery goods customs declaration, in accordance with the requirements of the Customs Administration of the Ministry of Finance, starting from May 1, 2020, if imported express delivery goods do not undergo real name authentication, customs declaration will no longer be accepted. To ensure the speed and rights of your purchase of overseas goods, please complete the certification on the EZ WAY Easy Commission APP promoted by the Customs Department and upload the certification information consistently to the platform.
realName.step4: Enter your real name authentication information on the EZ WAY Yiliwei APP

consultHistory.title: negotiation history
afterSaleDetails.title: After-sales details
afterSaleDetails.text1: The merchant will automatically agree to refund if it is not processed later.
afterSaleDetails.text2: The merchant will automatically refund the money if it is not processed later.
afterSaleDetails.text3-2: Within, modify the after-sales application, it will be automatically closed after timeout
afterSaleDetails.text4: If you do not return the goods after the purchase, the after-sales service will be automatically closed.
afterSaleDetails.text5: It is recommended to contact the merchant for negotiation. You can also modify or cancel the after-sales order. If it is not processed within the time limit, it will be automatically closed. After closing, you can still restart the after-sales service within the after-sales validity period. If you have any questions, please contact the platform customer service in time to serve you!
afterSaleDetails.text6: The platform will determine whether the after-sales service is satisfactory based on the negotiation history between the two parties. If satisfied, the operation will be refunded to you. If not, the after-sales order will be closed. After closing, you can still re-initiate after-sales service within the after-sales validity period.
afterSaleDetails.thsm_text: Dear buyer, your return and refund application has been approved. Please send the product back by yourself as long as the outer packaging of the product is intact and will not affect secondary sales. After sending the goods, please return to this page and fill in the return logistics tracking number information below.
afterSaleDetails.txdh: Fill in the return logistics order number
afterSaleDetails.ptjrtips: This operation will apply for platform intervention, please confirm whether to continue.
afterSaleDetails.cxsetips: This operation will cancel this application. If the problem is not resolved, you can initiate it again. Please confirm whether to continue.
afterSaleDetails.bcmstips: Supplementary description helps merchants better handle after-sales issues
afterSaleDetails.txdhinput: Please fill in the express delivery number
